title: Asian Noodle & Veggie Salad
directions: Cook or soak the noodles according to the packet instructions. Drain well and toss with a teaspoon of sesame oil. Mix or blitz the dressing ingredients together, and toss the noodles in half of the dressing.
Halve the pepper and pull out the white membrane with all the seeds. Slice finely. Peel the cucumber, halve and scoop out the seeds with a teaspoon and slice into long, thin strips.
Cut whatever green veggies you are using into thin, diagonal strips. Toss all the veggies including the mushrooms, spring onions and chilli with the noodles, coriander and the mint leaves.
Pile into a big bowl and serve with extra dressing drizzled over. Serve while still crunchy for springtime zing.
Add a dash of fish sauce to the dressing if you have it, and some chopped, roasted cashews for a treat.
ingredients: 1/2 a cucumber, peeled, seeded and finely sliced
100g green vegetables (sugar-snaps, mange touts, broccoli, pak choi, green beans, asparagus)
Chopped fresh coriander and mint (50g of each)
Handful of fresh coriander and mint leaves
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
